page.title: 07Farmland and Equipment Uses.
page.content: On the farm we visited there were 210 acres of land but the farmer also worked a further 290 acres.He ploughs and reseeds the fields every six years, doing about 20-30 acres at a time.He spreads manure in March,cuts the grass in June,spreads manure again and cuts again in August.Most is cut for silage making with a little for hay.Mr.Weaver uses manure mainly to fertilize but occasionally he uses nitrogen to promote grass growth. Four men are employed to service the tankers,tractors and other farm machinery.This machinery includes;six tractors,three silage trailers,a grass cutter and a chain harrow.This harrow hooks on to the back of a tractor and is used for levelling out the ground after ploughing and for breaking up the manure after spreading.
